writer.name: 莉拉·阿维莱斯 Lila Avilés

director.name: 莉拉·阿维莱斯 Lila Avilés

introduction: Ana wakes up, gets ready, looks out the window and goes to her office.She ends her day, walks the streets but nothing makes sense anymore. Her life is leaving her with everything she wanted to do, with what she thought she could go through if she maintained the joy of living, the joy we have when we are children but that she is abandoning us.The problem is that Ana is barely 9 years old and her dream has just begun.
